text: Kautilya Government Sarvodaya Bal Vidyalaya is a public senior secondary school undertaking of Government of Delhi,located in Chirag Enclave, New Delhi.It is one the 1093 government schools run by Delhi Directorate of Education which is a department under the education ministry of Delhi Government that manages the city's public school system. ==References== Category:Schools in Delhi
title: Kautilya Government Sarvodaya Bal Vidyalaya
